sentences.en: a new initiative aimed at beating the menace of illegal drugs
sentences.cn: 旨在打击非法毒品威胁的新举措

sentences.en: Birth control was illegal there until 1978.
By-laws are to make it illegal to smoke in public.
sentences.cn: 地方法规将规定在公共场合抽烟为非法。

sentences.en: Changing money on the street is illegal —always use a bank.
sentences.cn: 在街头兑换货币是违法的——无论何时都应该去银行。

sentences.en: Despite his illegal act, few people think badly of him.
sentences.cn: 尽管他干了违法的事情，但很少有人认为他不好。

sentences.en: Discrimination by employers on the grounds of race and nationality was illegal.
sentences.cn: 雇主以种族或国籍为由歧视员工是非法的。

sentences.en: I don't want to get mixed up with any illegal organization.
sentences.cn: 我不想与任何非法组织有牵连.

sentences.en: I have never taken illegal drugs.
sentences.cn: 我从未使用过违禁药品。

sentences.en: It is illegal and could endanger other people's lives.
sentences.cn: 这是非法的，可能会危及他人的生命。

sentences.en: It's illegal for unmarked mini-cabs to ply for hire.
sentences.cn: 无标志的电话预订出租车沿街拉客是非法的。

sentences.en: It's illegal to drive through a red light.
sentences.cn: 开车闯红灯是违章行为。

sentences.en: Other charges include fraud and illegal appropriation of land.
sentences.cn: 其他指控包括欺诈罪和非法侵占土地罪。

sentences.en: Parliament had decided that his removal from power was illegal.
sentences.cn: 国会决议认为他的免职是非法的。

sentences.en: Since 1977 otter hunting has been illegal.
sentences.cn: 捕猎水獭1977年以后就被列为非法了。

sentences.en: The by-law makes it illegal to drink in certain areas.
sentences.cn: 当地的地方法规规定在特定区域饮酒属于非法。

sentences.en: They were involved in illegal activities.
